title: Intrusive Man
description: Police Officer Max Simmons is the type of man that knows what he wants, and what he wants more than anything is Hannah Calhoun. But the pretty single mom has decided that love isn't in her future--and she has enough on her hands taking care of Geo, her young son. Luckily, Max is not easily deterred. And little Geo thinks Max will make a perfect dad. How long can Hannah resist these two determined gentlemen? .
author: Lass Small
